article: ## HTML5 Button Types and Functions ### Introduction HTML5 provides various types of buttons that can be used to enhance the user interface of a website. These buttons have different functions and can be customized to suit the design requirements of a web page. This documentation will provide an overview of the different button types available in HTML5 and how to use them effectively. ### Objective and Scope The objective of this documentation is to explain the different button types in HTML5 and their functions. It will also provide step-by-step instructions on how to use these buttons in a web page. The scope of this documentation is limited to the button types and functions provided by HTML5. ### Requirements and Pre-requisites To follow along with the examples in this documentation, you will need a basic understanding of HTML and CSS.
